title: The impact of extreme meteorological events: How agricultural models can deal with?
description:
MODEXTREME starts an interactive communication process with stakeholders that will be engaged to:

  • to provide perspective from target users of the project results in order to ensure relevance for the society
  • to advise the consortium on where and how the most promising results should be transferred

The first Stakeholder interaction workshop was a DG AGRI Lunchtime Session (12:45-13:45) that took place in Brussels on Thursday 10/04/2014. During this session Gianni Bellocchi (INRA) provided an overview of the project structure and objectives, and discussed how can agricultural models deal with the impact of extreme meteorological events.

A working group meeting (15:00-17:00) followed in which composition, action plan and timeline of the Stakeholder Platform were discussed.
